title: Mobile Collaborative Learning Design for Developing PISA-Type Mathematical Tasks

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Project-based assessments in BYOD environments emphasize the ability to develop math problems reflecting real-life contexts

learning_goals: Learners can analyze and design PISA-style math tasks by identifying their core elements (contextuality, openness, real-life relevance).
In a collaborative learning environment, use mobile tools to generate three or more peer feedback-based task improvement plans.
Develop two or more PISA-style tasks applying real-world cases (e.g., sports game analysis) in the domain of data uncertainty and statistical reasoning.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
